snippet: Charles Ergen would be making a bold bet by merging his satellite operator with T-Mobile US. Yet he is also known for playing his cards very carefully.
lead_paragraph: A poker pro like Dish Network’s chief executive, Charles Ergen, knows it is possible to win without the best cards. His hand may be getting weaker, however, as the cable and telecommunications industries consolidate rapidly around him. Mr. Ergen would be making a bold bet by merging his $35 billion satellite operator with similarly sized wireless provider T-Mobile US. Investors may want to guard against a bluff.

headline.main: Beware a Bluff From Dish’s Poker-Playing Boss
